Module wgu
Package wgu.controller

Class ModifyPartController

java.lang.Object
wgu.controller.ModifyPartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyPartController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This controller class allows the update of a specific part selected.

  • Method Details

    • onActionRadioButton

      public void onActionRadioButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method changes the label from 'Machine ID' to 'Company Name' when needed. If inHouseRadioButton is selected, MachineID will show If inHouseRadioButton is not selected, Company Name will show
      Parameters:
      event - - changes label

    • onActionSaveModifiedPart

      public void onActionSaveModifiedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method saves the newly modified part to the Observable List that holds all parts.
      Parameters:
      event - - saves part
      Throws:
      IOException - -
